display.name: Brushes
display.description: The set of combo brushes which help to do stylish makeup

display.name: BEAUTY BLENDERS
display.description: Beauty blenders will be you best friend if you want an airbrush, skin-like finish to your base makeup. Our beauty blender egg boxes contains latex-free, super soft beauty blenders; which can also be used both damp and dry for your makeup.

display.name: Lip Gloss
display.description: Want to drink your boba milk tea without the calories? Try our newest product, Boba Milk Tea Lip Gloss! Application is easy— with a built in applicator apply a thin layer over your lips, and voila! High shine perfection.

display.name: Mini Capsule Matte Liquid Lipstick
display.description: Capsule design is special and cute, and the packaging is upscale. Easily to be put in bag. Mousse-like texture that delivers soft-focus moisture-matte, comfortable colour with 6 hours of hydration.

display.name: Lightweight Foundations
display.description: These six light-as-air foundations are packed with skin-nourishing benefits and still manage to give skin a natural, air-brushed looking finish.

display.name: Ombre Blush
display.description: Ombre Blusher is a gorgeous gradient blush with a lightweight, silky formula that easily blends, delivering a high pigment payoff. A compact-sized floral dream of peachy tones for a natural-looking hue to your complexion.

display.name: Holographic Polish
display.description: Wide range of uniquely beautiful selection of holographic nail polishes. Curated with highest quality of holographic ingredients, selection from linear holo to scattered holo, be sure to check out our holographic nail polish collection today!

display.name: Best liquid pen eyeliners
display.description: After the initial blinding joy at the gorgeous spice market-inspired eye shadow palette, RiRi has redirected our attention to a part of the collection that may have flown under-the-radar: Fenty's first-ever liquid eyeliner, Flyliner.
